commit_message: Fix missing $scope.refresh function in CDNs table (#7853)
pull_request_title: Fix missing $scope.refresh function in CDNs table
pull_request_body:
Closes: #7852

Fix missing $scope.refresh function in CDNs table

<hr/>

## Which Traffic Control components are affected by this PR?
- Traffic Portal

## What is the best way to verify this PR?
- Create a CDN
- Delete it (should hide in the table after confirmation and not show any errors in Console)

## If this is a bugfix, which Traffic Control versions contained the bug?
<!-- Delete this section if the PR is not a bugfix, or if the bug is only in the master branch.
Examples:
- 5.1.2
- 5.1.3 (RC1)
 -->
